title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Standardization and Innovation for Improving Remote University Instructional Design Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the quality evaluation criteria (effectiveness, efficiency, enjoyment) of a remote university instructional design system.
Learners can design science education materials by applying standardized instructional design processes and e-learning content development strategies.
Learners can diagnose gaps in existing instructional design systems and propose creative improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
